text: Patricia Bowen Evans Whitford (1926 – 19 January 2020) was a Welsh gymnast.Pat Evans' obituary She competed in the women's artistic team all-around at the 1948 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:British female artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Great Britain Category:Gymnasts at the 1948 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Swansea
title: Pat Evans (gymnast)
